snippet.title: Monkey King: Master of the Clouds - Trailer
snippet.description:
A huge Japanese coin-op hit developed by HOT-B in 1989, the game was later renamed Cloud Master when released outside Japan on the Sega Master System. It subsequently appeared on NES, SFC, and the PC Engine. This upgraded release of the original arcade version includes HD ready elements by developer Starfish-SD, the company formed by the original HOT-B development team.

Available Now:

https://retroism.com/monkey-king/

PSN Store:

https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=UP2035-CUSA13899_00-MONKEYKING000001

Nintendo eShop:

https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/monkey-king-master-of-the-clouds-switch

https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Monkey-King-Master-of-the-Clouds-1433351.html
